Name: DarknessRoomDoor
Notes: A pair of closed doors that can be opened by activating SW_B. Unlike other variants, its collision can be enabled or disabled if desired.

Obj_arg0.Name: Collision Mode?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set and SW_A is active, it will synchronize the collision's validity with the switch's state.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_A.Description: If Obj_arg0 is set and this switch is used, it will keep the collision validated as long as this switch is active.

SW_B.Description: Makes the doors open once activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene. The doors open if the 扉開く cutscene part gets executed.
